segments.text: All right . I want to bring everybody in on this project . When can we start working on this ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , we could probably get started with a strategy meeting tomorrow morning at 8: 00 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I tell you what , 8: 00 is no good for me , but why don't you guys get started and I'll come by at around 8: 45 or so .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's fine with me . How much time are we going to have to work on this ?
segments.speaker: S2
